title: Encompass LOS Workflow Walkthrough - Screen Recording
description: Screen recording of IT administrator demonstrating the Encompass loan origination workflow from application intake through funding. Covers milestone triggers, automated alerts, role-based access, and integration points. Reveals disabled stale-doc alert rule (WF-008) and manual workarounds.
redaction_notes: Test environment used; all borrower data is synthetic

scene_segments.description: Application intake and initial data entry
Closing disclosure generation and compliance checks
Funding milestone and post-close QC trigger
Workflow rules review - WF-008 stale-doc alert DISABLED
Integration endpoints and API health dashboard
